Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Observation
b) Defect Observed: Emergency lighting system failure. Anomaly detected during routine inspection.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Corrosion due to moisture accumulation in sealed compartment
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Generator Control component. Inspection
revealed damage to critical components.
c) Remedial Measures Repair damaged area using approved repair scheme
i. Corrective Action:
ii. Preventive Action: Establish periodic calibration schedule
d) Attributable Code: F - Failure/ageing/Corrosion/Material Failure
Remarks: Complete defect analysis performed. Lessons learned documented.
Part V: Remarks by Design
Technical evaluation completed. Proposed preventive measures are appropriate and align with design intent.
